alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 8:51PM MST until September 12 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 850 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Granite Reef Dam, or near Fountain Hills, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeast Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, and Falcon Field Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 147 and 158. AZ Interstate 17 near mile marker 195. AZ Route 51 mile marker 1 and near mile marker 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
